Summary: RE: wings, loud, very large with blinking lights, particularly sexy
divs: Sighting DetailsWhy don't you stay off of this site. If you're not interested in UFO's what is the point. My guess is that you are a pre-pubescent punk who has nothing better to do. Although you did visit MUFON which tells me that you have some interest in UFO's, otherwise you would have posted your crap somewhere else. People like you screw it up for everyone else ! LOSER !
